assessments.status_rationale: No coverage of Apple's Sept. 9 event or on‑device generative AI announcements appeared in today’s news; the event has not occurred yet and the deadline is still ahead.
August Core CPI is scheduled for release in mid-September; today’s news included no CPI print or leak indicating the m/m outcome.
Nvidia reported earnings and the stock moved on the news, but the performance window runs through Oct. 15. One day of moves is insufficient to determine an ≥8 pp underperformance by AMD.
No reports of a definitive AT&T–EchoStar spectrum deal valued at $20B+ appeared in today’s coverage; the deadline remains in October.
Multiple articles discuss moves to remove Fed Governor Lisa Cook and potential litigation, but none report a federal court issuing a TRO or preliminary injunction.
No DoD RFI/memo/Federal Register notice about potential equity stakes or warrants in major defense contractors was noted in today’s news.
There is no mention of the Freddie Mac PMMS 30‑year average reaching ≥7.50% in today’s reports; upcoming weekly prints before Sept. 30 will determine this.
